text: Hi everyone!, I work on ecology (postdoc) at the University of Michigan. I am math enthusiastic and an R user. I have been also playing around with Julia language for several years ago, just at a basic level. I am pretty interested in going deeper into Hamiltonian MC methods using Turing.

elements.text: Hi everyone!, I work on ecology (postdoc) at the University of Michigan. I am math enthusiastic and an R user. I have been also playing around with Julia language for several years ago, just at a basic level. I am pretty interested in going deeper into Hamiltonian MC methods using Turing.

text: There's also a lot of discussion about ecology happening on Zulip. It's been quiet lately, but there's a lot of talk about the package ecosystem for ecology.
